content: lightweight crochet cardigan pattern for beginners and pros alike available in us women s sizes xs-xxl this lightweight cardi was designed to fill the cardigan void in all the seasons beyond winter it s lacey and breathable so it s so comfy from spring through to the fall it s very easy to make even if this is your first attempt at making crochet clothes if you love trendy crochet garments that are easy to make this is definitely for you the pattern is made in two pieces a left half and right half including the sleeve made exactly the same that means we ll be crocheting the front and back at the same time basically materials i used holst garn titicaca thin alpaca in color crown #0 lace weight yarn but i held 2 stands together so that ll equal #1 fingering weight 4mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle stitch marker skill easy notes this pattern uses english us terminology this pattern made as women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl this cardigan is worked flat in 2 separate pieces and then sewn together 2 panels are made the same this pattern is in multiples of 2 chain in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed 2440 2600 2800 2960 3160 3320 yards of #0 lace weight if you re using #1 fingering weight cut the yardage in half plus a little extra just to be safe gauge blocked 23 st x 10 row = 4 in main stitch pattern row 12 and 13 is a main stitch pattern repeat to make a gauge swatch chain 30 or an even number and then crochet row 1-27 measurements after blocked xs = 24 body width across x 25 73 length s = 25 60 body width across x 25 73 length m = 27 20 body width across x 27 04 length l = 28 80 body width across x 27 04 length xl = 30 40 body width across x 28 34 length xxl = 32 body width across x 28 34 length thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
